about_the_game:
Dash into Season Three by unlocking the newest Rogue, Juke! Juke is an intelligent engineer that uses her quick mobility and technical skills to gain the upper hand against her enemies. Show off with her Furmi.62 Outfit as well as the Green Hardware Melee Weapon Wrap in this pack.

This Pack Contains:
- Juke Unlock
- Furmi.62 Juke Outfit
- Green Hardware Melee Weapon Wrap
detailed_description:
Dash into Season Three by unlocking the newest Rogue, Juke! Juke is an intelligent engineer that uses her quick mobility and technical skills to gain the upper hand against her enemies. Show off with her Furmi.62 Outfit as well as the Green Hardware Melee Weapon Wrap in this pack.

This Pack Contains:

- Green Hardware Melee Weapon Wrap

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core i5-2320
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 555
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 3.20 ghz 12
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

Juke is an intelligent engineer that uses her quick mobility and technical skills to gain the upper hand against her enemies. Show off with her Furmi.62 Outfit as well as the Green Hardware Melee Weapon Wrap in this pack.
